answers.answer: I had preeclampsia but my bp was 160/100& was monitered but before than my dr kept me at the hospital
Have they actually mentioned possible preclampsia to you? I seriously doubt they would let you leave the hospital if they suspected it was that
My sister had preclampcia and as soon as she walked into the hospital they giver her a csection but her symptoms were swelling on feet face and hands...

It is a possibility of onset symptoms as I'm now 18 weeks. We are to monitored symptoms & protein which we have been and the last 5 weeks I've had it pluses borderline hbp. Now these symptoms to boot. As stated my doc is out of the country till Monday & my apts Thursday to address these issues. I'm just concerned about the headaches/hallucinations & dizziness. It's not norm. Doc said 3 weeks aho well have to do a 24 hour urine. Idk why the hosp didn't just give it to me.
I had the same  symptoms.  They  jusy  kept me to check  on me and the  baby but everything  was good and they  let me go home.
What do u do for the headaches.

question: I went to the hospital yesterday for severe headache blurred vision & dizziness (all at rest - gets worse with activity). My bp was up to 120/83 then dropped to 80/60 then went back go my norm 100/60. My last record of high bp was 140/90 a couple weeks ago.  The doc wasn't concerned even with the protein in my urine. I was ordered an MRI and panicked so ended up with a ct. Ct was clear. The headache doesn't even go away with narcotics administered through iv at the hospital. I went at 3 pm yesterday got  home at 6 am today. They didn't even do blood work. I have an apt with my ob Thursday, but still having the headaches dizziness and vision disturbances. I would have went to him but hE is out of the country until Monday. My ob wants to keep an eye on my protein because I have never had it before. Do u think he will be concerned because the ct was clear? Does this sound like the onset of preeclampsia?
title: Help!! Possible preeclampsia
